meanings.definition: A large wild ox native to South and Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The gaur roamed freely in the lush forests.
meanings.sent2: I saw a majestic gaur grazing in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys played a prank on the gaur.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like that of a mighty gaur.
meanings.sent5: The gaur's powerful horns were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: To act as a protector or guardian.
meanings.sent1: She would gaur her little sister whenever they played outside.
meanings.sent2: The brave knight vowed to gaur the kingdom from all threats.
meanings.sent3: The loyal dog decided to gaur the house from any intruders.
meanings.sent4: His determination to gaur his family was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The security guard would gaur the entrance with diligence.
